content: CUKBRAINSearch this siteEmbedded FilesSkip to main contentSkip to navigation BRAIN Lab.Biomedical Research based on Artificial Intelligence and Neural Engineering LaboratoryWelcome to BRAIN Lab!!The main interests in this laboratory are EEG-based diagnosis of neural diseases and brain-computer interface (BCI). Additionally, we aim to analyze various types of biosignals using machine learning for the application of wearable devices.We are looking for graduate and undergraduate students who are interested in Cognitive Neurosciences, Biomedical Engineering, and Digital Healthcare Applications including Wearable or VR devices. If you want to join us, please email donghwa@catholic.ac.kr.Research InterestsMachine Learning / Deep Learning AnalysisEEG-based neurological disorder analysis using deep LearningBiomedical Signal Processing with Machine LearningNeuroengineeringBrain-Computer InterfaceBrain-inspired AIDigital Healthcare and Virtual RealityDigital therapeutics and Computer Aided DiagnosisVirtual RealityEye tracking and Motion trackingMedical AI and NeuroscienceBiomedical data analysisBehavioral NeuroscienceContactAdvisor's OfficeMichael Hall T908, Songsim (Sacred Heart in Korean) Global Campus, The Catholic University of Korea, 43, Jibong-ro, Bucheon, Gyeonggi-do 14662, Republic of Korea.Lab.D533 & B350, Songsim (Sacred Heart in Korean) Global Campus, The Catholic University of Korea, 43, Jibong-ro, Bucheon, Gyeonggi-do 14662, Republic of Korea.Email donghwa@catholic.ac.kr Tel+82) 02-2164-5521MapGoogle SitesReport abusePage detailsPage updated Google SitesReport abuse
